data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 493,500 citizens of the the state of Laghman.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Laghman, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Laghman, Afghanistan to the gospel today.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Laghman, Afghanistan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Laghman, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 493,406, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Laghman, Afghanistan.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Laghman, Afghanistan has a population of 493,500.

We estimate Laghman has 78 people who might know Jesus, 15 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 493,406 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,326 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 493,500 souls in Laghman and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
